entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Îles-de-la-Madeleine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Îles de la Madeleine Airport 10:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -5.7°C
Wind: WSW 29 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with rain near midnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Blowing snow before morning. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
